title: Portrait Blur set to come to Google Photos for Android w/ support for more subjects
content:
As part of its almost constant evolution, the Google Photos app for Android is set to gain expanded Portrait Blur effects which will work on older images and even more subjects.

moreâ€¦

The post Portrait Blur set to come to Google Photos for Android w/ support for more subjects appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Photos for Android is set to gain expanded Portrait Blur effects even on older images and will work with even more subjects.
